title: august 23: stockholm syndrome
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the term Stockholm Syndrome and the plot-twisting bank robbery that popularized it. After, Maia revisits the 2019 release of Taylor Swift’s album, Lover, a pivotal juncture in Swift’s career. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
